SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.clientcontroller.controller

Class ClientControllerRMI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.clientcontroller.controller.ClientControllerRMI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientController, Serializable
public class ClientControllerRMI extends Object implements ClientController, Serializable
The ClientControllerRMI class represents the RMI implementation of the client controller. Handles communication between client and server using RMI. It also interacts with the user interface to display information and receive user input.
See Also:
